    These attributes define the maximal queue size of a QP.

    Attributes used when initializing a queue pair.

    Represent a receive work request.

    Represent a send work request.
    IbvSendWR.Atomic
    Unsupported.
    IbvSendWR.IbvWrOcode 
    IbvSendWR.Rdma
    Specifies the remote buffer to be used in READ or WRITE operations.
    IbvSendWR.Ud
    Unsupported.

    A scatter/gather element.

    Represents a work completion event.
